title: Koi Lamha Gulab Ho
description: Koi Lamha Gulab Ho is a story about social differences and the problems faced by lower class people. It contains romance and sadness. Faiqa belongs to the lower class. Even though she works hard at an office to keep her family well-fed, financial problems arise everyday. But when she catches the eye of her employer's young son, her life is about to change forever. The question is, in a good or bad way?
author: Nighat Abdullah
